DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this research study is to develop better dosing of anticoagulation medication in both Caucasian and African Americans through analysis of various genetic factors.
DOC.brief_title: Predictors of Anticoagulation Control on Warfarin Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: This is a prospective cohort study among adult patients requiring warfarin therapy. Patients presenting for anticoagulation will be identified at the start of therapy and followed throughout their course until they reach maintenance dose. We will then develop a dosing equation for warfarin using patient, environmental and genetic factors.
DOC.criteria: All Caucasians and African Americans who are new to warfarin therapy Under 21 years of age Non caucasian Non african american Have an abnormal INR before warfarin or heparin therapy Unable to provide consent
